name: nodmord

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, csur), word(cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(cdm(c0), con0))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c0), con0), word(cdm(c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ No → Ord(dom(c0)))
⊣ (c0 ∈ No → dom(c0)∈ On)
⊣ (dom(c0)∈ On → Ord(dom(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, csur), word(cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(cdm(c0), con0))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c0), con0), word(cdm(c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ No → Ord(dom(c0)))
⊣ (c0 ∈ No → dom(c0)∈ On)
⊣ (dom(c0)∈ On → Ord(dom(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, csur), word(cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c0), con0), word(cdm(c0)))

comment: The domain of a surreal has the ordinal property. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jun-2011.)
